word_mean: 〔复basidia〕担子：担子菌纲真菌的棒状器，在核配合和减数分裂后，产生担孢子，见spore

sentence.Network_en: Usually four sterigmata, each bearing one basidiospore , are borne on each basidium.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常在一个担子上有四个担孢子梗, 每个担孢子梗上都产生一个担孢子.

sentence.Network_en: The cultivated mushroom is an exception, with only two sterigmata on each basidium.
sentence.Network_cn: 成熟的蘑菇例外, 每个担子上仅有两个孢子梗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 担子菌的子实体能产生担子（basidium）及担孢子（basidispore），故又称为担子果（basidicarp）。因目前人工栽培的食用菌基本上 …
basidiospore 担子孢子basidium 孢子台basification 碱化

the cultivated mushroom is an exception , with only two sterigmata on each basidium .成熟的蘑菇例外，每个担子上仅有两个孢子梗。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek basidion, diminutive of basis (see basis)

means.word_mean: 1. a small club-shaped structure typically bearing four basidiospores at the ends of minute projections; unique to basidiomycetes
